dict.acceptation: 某物，某事；重要的事物[人]，有一定意义的事物；
（表示不确切的描述或数量）大致，左右；

sent.orig: The point of a variable is to have something that changes between each state and transition.
sent.trans: 变量的作用就是持有一些在每个过渡与状态之间发生改变的元素(something)。

sent.orig: Something old, something new, something borrowed, something blue and a sixpence in your shoe.
sent.trans: 有旧，有新，有借，有蓝；在一只鞋里放一枚六便士的银币。

sent.orig: Everybody gets the luck time to achieve something, to accomplish something, to avoid something.
sent.trans: 每个人都需要一段幸运的时光来实现、完成或是避免一些事。

sent.orig: Transforming something strong into something superb takes as much effort much more thrilling.
sent.trans: 以同样力气将原本就很优的东西变成超水准，对你来说比较刺激。

sent.orig: Don't let go of something until you have a hold of something else.
sent.trans: 不管是西瓜还是芝麻，没捡到前别把手里的扔了。
